ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cofmpt.1 | |- ( ph -> F : C --> D ) |
| 2 |  | cofmpt.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( x e. A |-> B ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_feqmptd | |- ( ph -> F = ( y e. C |-> ( F ` y ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( y = B -> ( F ` y ) = ( F ` B ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_fmptco | |- ( ph -> ( F o. ( x e. A |-> B ) ) = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` B ) ) ) |
